title: Drayke
description: The battle is on, for the Three Gates, and her heart. Abducted from Earth and forced to become a gladiator, Nova resigns herself to a short, loveless life. But after being injured in the arena, she meets Drayke, the hunky blue alien doctor, who informs her they've already bonded.And he has a secret. One that could change everything. Now they're in a fight, not just to open the Three Gates, but for her heart. And the stakes are high. Life, death, and love.If you like alien alphas who fall quickly and forever, and the strong, smart women they bond with, then join Nova and Drayke in the standalone fifth fifth book in the paranormal romance Galaxy Gladiators Series.Contains steamy sex scenes, dangerous rescues, hot muscular aliens, and kickass heroines. Warning: you'll need a change of panties when they open the Gates! Guaranteed no cheating, no cliffhangers, and a happily ever after.Buy Drayke today to start this Firefly meets Spartacus adventure today!
author: Alana Khan
